attributes.title: suckssssss😂
attributes.review: This is a HORRIBLE APP. Trump did not help us achieve anything and they make this app. I hope it gets taken down so that orange 🍊 can feel bad. Really bad app. I don’t even know why it’s on the Apple store.😐pitiful.

attributes.title: trump
attributes.review: I’m disappointed with the fact none of his promises came true. Especially the one where he claimed he would build a wall between us and Mexico! I want THE WALL!!!

attributes.title: worst app ever
attributes.review: it took almost 2 weeks too download and really just wast a good app i opened the app and RIGHT off the bat hated it with everything in my blood 10/10 do NOT recommend.

attributes.title: made my aunt commit suicide.
attributes.review: my aunt accidentally downloaded the app and was automatically put into a depressing state of mind it’s really heartbreaking because this app is what caused her to commit suicide. this app is horrible and NO ONE should download it.

attributes.title: Disappointed 🍊
attributes.review: This app made my grandma die again. I would give it 0 if I can. Apple delete this app. I had to take my cat on a walk because of this. My gosh what nerve do people have🍊

attributes.title: Awful man
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see the good side of trump but instead I figured out he is a racist homophobe who wants to “pull and tug” with his own daughter. I also figured out he was destroyed our economy

attributes.title: horrible
attributes.review: thought i would found reasons to like him. found none. he is a rapist & a racist. and MAGA definitely is not working. if anything it just got sort. it'd be MAB(making america bad).

attributes.title: No wayyy
attributes.review: I downloaded this to find a good reason for trump to be our president and as I predicted there are none and as many can see trump does not have the right mindset to be president and needs to go.....

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: I used this to try and find a reason to like Donald trump he is a terrible person and tbh I hope he gets kicked off the White House he is a rude racist pice of carp and I hope the worst for him really

attributes.title: This app doesn’t work!
attributes.review: Once downloaded, the app kept crashing. I had originally downloaded the app to convince we to vote for trump and well I’ll be darned if it just didn’t work. 🤷🏻‍♀️
